io.github.andreaszks.ergasales.tools

Class SwingTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.andreaszks.ergasales.tools.SwingTools

  • public final class SwingTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods that modify or create Swing components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void resizeColumns(javax.swing.JTable table)
      Resizes table so the small cells do not take much space if there are cells with more content.
      static void showErrorDialog(java.lang.String message)
      Shows a JOptionPane error message dialog.

      Creates a Save FileChooser and returns the selected file.
      static java.io.File showImportFileChooser(java.lang.String extension)
      Shows a JFileChooser open dialog that lists only the files of specified extension.
      static void showXmlErrorDialog(java.lang.String message)
      Shows a JOptionPane error message dialog that describe an XML error.

      • showExportFileChooser

        public static java.io.File showExportFileChooser(java.lang.String extension)
        Creates a Save FileChooser and returns the selected file.

        If the File already exists, ask for overwrite confirmation.

        Parameters:
        extension - the extension of the file, written without the dot
        Returns:
        the selected File or null if cancelled

      • showImportFileChooser

        public static java.io.File showImportFileChooser(java.lang.String extension)
        Shows a JFileChooser open dialog that lists only the files of specified extension.
        Parameters:
        extension -
        Returns:
        the file you select, null if dialog is closed/cancelled
